channel.title: Kings Guard - Class Suggestion/Rework King
channel.description:
**Blue Dragon**
(Passive) - Is able to talk to the king during the night (Passive 2) -The king can order the Kings guard to kill someone will bypass night immunity (Passive 3) is not convertable
Night Ability Guards the King 6 Times Night Ability 2 Is able to kill the king Will suicide the same night if the king is good will stay as kings guard if the king is evil.(1)
Will suicide if the king dies at night If the king gets voted for treason the kings guard will get 4 new guard but wont be able to execute.
**Kings Guard Neutral**
(Passive) - Is able to talk to the king during the night Passive 2 - The king can order the Kings guard to kill someone will bypass night immunity
Night Ability Guards the King 6 Times
Goal: to see the king win will suicide if the king dies.
**Kings guard Unseen**
(Passive) - Is able to talk to the king during the night Passive 2 - The king can order the Kings guard to execute kings guard will attack the person the king has ordered the execute on
Night Ability Guards the King 4 Times will not guard against unseen members
Some notes -Butler can no longer poison King -Kings abilities is replaced by the king guard the king can still order the kings guard to execute 2 times. -The first Kings guard is always BD/NEUT -Only knight can step up as kings guard? -Will not follow the execute order if the king guard is killing the king -is not able to guard if the king orders a execute
**Some other ideas** Some people on the discord thought that it would be better if a BD kings guard became a knight if the king died or got voted up for treason. allow the kings guard to give a note to a player at night.
